name: Starship demo
description:
Credits

Spaceship base model by Malik Endlsey (mse2143); textured by me. 

Skybox and gas giant textures were photobashed together from the output of Midjourney prompts using PhotoShop.

Skybox was processed into cubemap format using Panorama to Cubemap. https://jaxry.github.io/panorama-to-cubemap/ 

Camera controller is a derivative of a controller I wrote myself for a previous project.

Moons of Jupiter textures. Planet Texture Maps Wiki. https://planet-texture-maps.fandom.com/wiki/Category:Moons_of_Jupiter 

Moons of Saturn textures. Planet Texture Maps Wiki. https://planet-texture-maps.fandom.com/wiki/Category:Moons_of_Saturn  

Saturn’s B ring peaks. European Space Agency. https://www.esa.int/ESA_Multimedia/Images/2018/02/Saturn_s_B_ring_peaks 

Ship thruster particles based on an example by Kay20000 posted to the Unity forum. https://forum.unity.com/threads/jet-rocket-engine-effect.64227/ 

Dynamics of Flight. NASA. https://www.grc.nasa.gov/www/k-12/UEET/StudentSite/dynamicsofflight.html 

Difference between the two quaternions. StackOverflow. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22157435/difference-between-the-two-quaternions 

Find points on a plane. Mathematics Stack Exchange. https://math.stackexchange.com/questions/2563909/find-points-on-a-plane 

How to Create Professional Materials. Kaizen Tutorials, YouTube. https://youtu.be/-x-b2U-MSgc
